scripts.test_Task_3: rm -rf Task_3/reports/allure-report && rm -rf Task_3/reports/allure-results && playwright test paraBankTest.spec.ts && mv allure-results Task_3/reports
scripts.report_Task_3: allure generate Task_3/reports/allure-results --clean -o Task_3/reports/allure-report && allure open Task_3/reports/allure-report
